description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the ABB IRB 120.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for ABB IRB 120 manipulators. (No variants are supported yet.)
Joint limits and max joint velocities are based on the configurations in from IFRA's SimRealRobotControl. Go check 'out on github.

Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with. Not doing so will likely just cause your program to error.
